title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', ...../compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I installed rust with "rustup" and used "cargo new hello_cargo", amended the Cargo.toml to have ```bash [dependencies] polars = { git = "https://github.com/pola-rs/polars"} connectorx = "0.2.2" ``` I then ran `rustup override set nightly` and `RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (e6b883c74 2021-12-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38 commit-date: 2021-12-08 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 roger@roger:~/repos/hello_ ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling arrow2 v0.8.1 (https://github.com/jorgecarleitao/arrow2?rev=021a8e3aebca5562f5b7fa2f7547fb716843ae97#021a8e3a) Compiling connectorx v0.2.2 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (e6b883c74 2021-12-08) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type cdylib --crate-type rlib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `connectorx` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (e6b883c74 2021-12-08) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling arrow2 v0.8.1 (https://github.com/jorgecarleitao/arrow2?rev=021a8e3aebca5562f5b7fa2f7547fb716843ae97#021a8e3a) Compiling connectorx v0.2.2 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/e6b883c74f49f32cb5d1cbad3457f2b8805a4a38/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14
